text: Duncan Russell (12 March 1958 â€“ 18 August 2017) was an English football manager. He was born in London, England. He was the manager of Conference National side Mansfield Town until 12 May 2011 when they decided not to renew his contract. Russell died in London of liver cancer on 18 August 2017 at the age of 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English football managers Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Duncan Russell
